parentPage.fieldDescription: Define a path to find child pages within, leave this field empty to use the current path.
parentPage.name: ./parentPage

parentPage.fieldDescription: Define a path to find descendant pages, leave this field empty to use the current path.
parentPage.name: ./ancestorPage

searchIn.fieldDescription: Leave empty to use current site (eg. /content/mysite)
searchIn.name: ./searchIn

parentPage.fieldDescription: Leave empty to use current page
parentPage.name: ./tagsSearchRoot

useDetailsTags.fieldDescription: Choose whether or not the cq:tags property on the details component should be searched too.
useDetailsTags.name: ./useDetailsTags

datasource.path: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-dialog/common/true-false

orderBy.fieldDescription: Define how the results will be sorted when queried, this doesn't apply to static lists.
orderBy.name: ./orderBy

datasource.path: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-dialog/components/lists/list/orderby

sortOrder.fieldDescription: Set how the results will be sorted.
sortOrder.name: ./sortOrder

limit.fieldDescription: Maximum number of items displayed in the list.
limit.name: ./limit

pagination.fieldDescription: Set the number of results before pagination will appear.
pagination.name: ./pageMax

badge.fieldDescription: Which badge template should be used when generating each result?
badge.name: ./detailsBadge

datasource.path: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-dialog/components/lists/${context}/badge

showHidden.fieldDescription: Define whether or not pages hidden from navigation will be visible in the list.
showHidden.name: ./showHidden

datasource.path: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-dialog/common/true-false

printStructure.fieldDescription: When 'false', the HTML structure won't be generated around each result.
printStructure.name: ./printStructure

datasource.path: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-dialog/common/true-false

listSplit.fieldDescription: Toggle the results so they are broken into sets of results instead of one long list.
listSplit.name: ./listSplit

datasource.path: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-dialog/common/true-false

listSplitEvery.fieldDescription: How many results should occur before the section split occurs?
listSplitEvery.name: ./listSplitEvery

datasource.path: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-dialog/common/true-false

feedType.fieldDescription: Which feed type should be made available for this list?
feedType.name: ./feedType
